page.title: 17Light Industry in Oakley
page.content: In Oakley the industries are farming and building. There are new properties in Mill Road and Worminghall Road. They have been built at Worminghall because the old houses were not safe. The building firms are Fennell and Blake and Durndells . Fennell and Blakes vans are blue . The cattle kept are Friesians.There is a chicken farm. An electric fence keeps sheep in. There is a corn field at the aerodrome. This is unusual because there was a hard run-way there .Behind the place at the cattle farm where the lorries are kept is Hopccroft Transport and you can often see their lorries. The biggest farms in Oakley are Manor Farm and Jericho Farm. Manor farm is on the edge of Oakley.
